con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="PicketLinkSTS" targetNamespace="urn:picketlink:identity-federation:sts" xmlns:tns="urn:picketlink:identity-federation:sts" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsap10="http://www.w3.org/2006/05/addressing/wsdl" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:picketlink:identity-federation:sts" version="1.0" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="MessageBody"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:any minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded" namespace="##any"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="RequestSecurityToken"> <wsdl:part name="rstMessage" element="tns:MessageBody"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> <wsdl:part name="rstrMessage" element="tns:MessageBody"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="SecureTokenService"> <wsdl:operation name="IssueToken"> <wsdl:input wsap10:Action="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/trust/RST/Issue" message="tns:RequestSecurityToken"/> <wsdl:output wsap10:Action="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/trust/RSTR/Issue" message="tns:RequestSecurityTokenResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="STSBinding" type="tns:SecureTokenService"> <soap12:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="IssueToken"> <soap12:operation soapAction="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/trust/RST/Issue" style="document"/> <wsdl:input> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap12:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="PicketLinkSTS"> <wsdl:port name="PicketLinkSTSPort" binding="tns:STSBinding"> <soap12:address location="http://localhost:8080/picketlink-sts"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope"> <soapenv:Header xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing"> <wsse:Security <wst:RequestSecurityToken xmlns:wst="http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/200512"> <wst:RequestType>http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/200512/Issue</wst:RequestType> <wsp:AppliesTo xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy"> <wsa:EndpointReference xmlns:wsa="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing"> <wsa:Address>http://www.vangent.com/X-ServiceProvider-HIEOS</wsa:Address> </wsa:EndpointReference> </wsp:AppliesTo> <wst:Claims Dialect="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:claims" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance/"> <xspa:ClaimType Uri="urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:subject:subject-id" xmlns:xspa="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:claims"> <xspa:ClaimValue>Joe Smith</xspa:ClaimValue> </xspa:ClaimType> <xspa:ClaimType Uri="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:subject:purposeofuse" xmlns:xspa="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:claims"> <xspa:ClaimValue>EMERGENCY</xspa:ClaimValue> </xspa:ClaimType> <!-- <xspa:ClaimType Uri="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:subject:purposeofuse" xmlns:xspa="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:claims"> <xspa:ClaimValue> <hl7:PurposeForUse code="FooCode" codeSystem="FooCodeSystem" codeSystemName="FooCodeSystemName" xsi:type="CE" xmlns:hl7="urn:hl7-org:v3"/> </xspa:ClaimValue> </xspa:ClaimType> --> <xspa:ClaimType Uri="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:subject:organization-id" xmlns:xspa="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:claims"> <xspa:ClaimValue>HIP-O</xspa:ClaimValue> </xspa:ClaimType> <xspa:ClaimType Uri="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:subject:organization" xmlns:xspa="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:claims"> <xspa:ClaimValue>HIP-O Organization Name</xspa:ClaimValue> </xspa:ClaimType> <xspa:ClaimType Uri="urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:2.0:subject:role" xmlns:xspa="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:claims"> <xspa:ClaimValue>ROLE</xspa:ClaimValue> </xspa:ClaimType> <xspa:ClaimType Uri="urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:resource:resource-id" xmlns:xspa="urn:oasis:names:tc:xspa:1.0:claims"> <xspa:ClaimValue>PID</xspa:ClaimValue> </xspa:ClaimType> </wst:Claims> <!--<wst:KeyType>http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-trust/200512/SymmetricKey</wst:KeyType>--> </wst:RequestSecurityToken> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
